PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-15062017-12-01,  ,  ,  ESDC,  NR,  TB,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectJanet De La Torre Remission Order
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits a total of sums paid or payable by JANET DE LA TORRE 1) under Part I of the Income Tax Act, as repayment of Canada child tax benefits received with respect to the 2012 base year; and 2) under the Universal Child Care Benefit Act as repayment of benefits received in the 2013 and 2014.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2017-0081 Publication Date: 2017-12-13
AttachmentsAttachment
